Caption: Mr. Surjit S. Randhava (Student Representative) addresses the audience at the Third Institute Day
Description: The Third Institute Day took place at the Instituteâ€™s Building Sciences Block on the IITM campus. The chief guest for the event was Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communications). The Institute Day of IIT Madras is a day marked to celebrate the hard work and success of people who have shown excellence in academics as well as extracurricular activities. A number of students, faculty and dignitaries were present at the event. Prizes were awarded to students, faculty and alumni as well. In the image from the left: Dr. P. Subbarayan, Dr. A. L. Mudaliar (Chairman, Board of Governors) and Prof. B. Sengupto (Director) are seated on the dais while Mr. Surjit S. Randhava addresses the audience.
